sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' export default class AddToCartComponent extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { open: false, setOpen: false, itemType: '', itemModel: '', processor: '', ramSize: '', hddSize: '', quantity: 0, acquiredPrice: 0, generation: '', cart: [] } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); } handleChange(evt) { const value = evt.target.value; const name = evt.target.name; this.setState({ ...this.state, [name]: value, }); // console.log(this.state) } addItem = () => { let tempCart = this.state.cart let item = { itemType: this.state.itemType, processor: this.state.processor, ramSize: this.state.ramSize, hddSize: this.state.hddSize, quantity: this.state.quantity, acquiredPrice: this.state.acquiredPrice, generation: this.state.generation } tempCart.push(item) this.setState( { ...this.state, cart: tempCart, } ) console.log(this.state.cart) } printCart = () => { let cart = this.state.cart return cart.map((item, index) => { let { itemType, processor, ramSize, hddSize, quantity, acquiredPrice, generation } = item return {quantity} {itemType} }) } render() { return
{//first div for inputs }

{ this.printCart() }
} }
